subject: Finally, my first post of my results
author: Lisby
full_text:
I don't know how it can get clearer than this sample.  I'm assuming  
it is Lisa, because right before it there was a soft male whisper,  
"Lisa." Sounds like she's running her box with cool precision,  
doesn't it?

I've set up a folder in our files area for my samples.

Ann
